definition: A person who creates written works, such as novels, poems, or plays, often with the intention of entertaining or informing readers. This term is commonly used to refer to individuals who are professionally engaged in writing literature.

examples.german: Sie hat viele Bücher als Schriftstellerin veröffentlicht.
examples.english: She has published many books as a writer.
The writer won the literature prize.

examples.german: Als Schriftsteller muss man viel Fantasie haben.
examples.english: As a writer, one must have a lot of imagination.

examples.german: Der berühmte Schriftsteller wurde in Berlin geboren.
examples.english: The famous writer was born in Berlin.
